sourcesContent:
<template>
  <v-container fluid>
    <v-row align="center">
      <v-col cols="12" md="6">
        <v-autocomplete
          :items="participantUsers"
          small-chips
          clearable
          color="grey"
          label="参加者を追加"
          item-text="name"
          item-value="id"
          multiple
          :value="value"
          @input="$emit('input', $event)"
        >
        </v-autocomplete>
      </v-col>
    </v-row>
  </v-container>
</template>

<script>
import { mapActions, mapGetters } from 'vuex';

export default {
  name: 'GuestSelectForm',
  props: ['value'],
  data() {
    return {
      participantUsers: []
    }
  }
};
</script>
